text: The DR Congo women's national under-18 and under-19 is a national basketball team of Mali and is governed by the Basketball Federation of Democratic Republic of Congo. It represents Democratic Republic of the Congo in international under-19 and under-18 (under age 19 and under age 18) women's basketball competitions. The team was formerly known as the Zaire women's national under-18 and under-19 basketball team. ==See also== * DR Congo women's national basketball team * DR Congo national under-19 basketball team ==References== Basketball Basketball Category:Women's national under-19 basketball teams
title: DR Congo women's national under-19 basketball team
